review: I bought this awhile ago but just started to use it yesterday.  At first it worked just fine.  I was watching the second season of Downton Abbey but then it started to buffer and told me my internet connection was too slow.  Since then I cannot watch anything with the Fire TV stick because it insists the internet connection is too slow.  When I check the internet connection, it shows the connection is very good.  I had such high hopes for this product.
